Text.Page: There are reports of {@LinkCreature:42#800#besharan gulas} in the southern part of the temple. While you're killing them, see what you can find out about how they control the undead, especially those {@LinkCreature:42#700#vicious bone imps}.

So the gulas who were controlling undead carried these crystals? Let me see...

See this? It's a besharan seal and next to it a naga seal!

I have to get this news to Frontera. Thank you for your help, .
When we know how the gulas are controlling the undead, we can turn that knowledge to our advantage.
